{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = BeagleBone Black (A5A).jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = BeagleBone Black |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://beagleboard.org/black |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = BeagleBone_Black_(A5A) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = BeagleBoard |model = BeagleBone |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Black |revision = (A5A) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/16/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/BeagleBone_Black_(A5A) |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;Sitara AM3359;XAM3359AZCZ100; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC2GMTEA-0F-WT; |flash1size = 2 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = SMSC;LAN8710A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C8:A0:30
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.04;-dirty; |stockos = Linux;3.8.11;Angstrom v2012.12;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot, GPIO, |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, 3.3v TTL |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI |addchip = Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65217C;;1;,,, 4 Channel ESD Solution for USB;Texas Instruments;TPD4S012DRY;;2;,,, 500ma Low Noise Voltage Regulator;Texas Instruments;TL5209D;;1;,,, Power Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2051BDGN;;1;,,, Single Positive-edge-triggered D-type Flip-flop;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G74DCT;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver with 3-State Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN47LVC2G241DCU;;1;,,, Single Inverter Buffer Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G06DCK;;1;,,, 32K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC32AT-I/OT;;1;,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.7.2 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = CircuitCo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, Arch Linux (Arm), OpenWrt
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2013 |estprice = 49.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00CHYOLHK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = US
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM: CircuitCo, SeeedStudio (LGX BB100)
The board can be powered by 3 different methods: *5V/1A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B *Expansion connectors
Micro HDMI output {{see also|BeagleBoard|List of SBCs}}
==Links of Interest== *[http://linuxgizmos.com/beaglebone-black-gains-15-dollar-metal-enclosure/ ''BeagleBone Black $15 metal enclosure ships'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/texasinstruments/texasinstruments_beagleboneblack |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/texas_instruments/beaglebone_black |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=58808 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = omap |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a8_vfpv3 |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = 22.03.7 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
